Detailed Description

Common interface for all shapes which are mouse events receiver.

Definition at line 22 of file IMouseActionObserver.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool iview::IMouseActionObserver::OnMouseButton ( istd::CIndex2d  position,
Qt::MouseButton  buttonType,
bool  downFlag 
)
pure virtual

It is called, when mouse button is pushed down or up on this object.

Parameters
position- position of mouse pointer on client area (picture coords).
downFlag- true, if mouse button is pushed down, false if pushed up.
Returns
true if this shape should get focus to catch all mouse movements.

Implemented in iview::CViewBase, iview::CParallelogramShape, iview::CTransformableRectangleShape, iview::CPolygonShape, iview::CTubePolylineShape, iview::CLabelShape, iview::CInteractiveShapeBase, iview::CArrowShape, iview::CLineShape, iview::CRectangleShape, iview::CAnnulusShape, iview::CPinShape, iview::CCenterPinShape, iview::CPolylineShape, iview::CPerspectiveCalibrationBoundsShape, iview::CCircleShape, and iview::CAnnulusSegmentShape.

virtual bool iview::IMouseActionObserver::OnMouseMove ( istd::CIndex2d  position)
pure virtual

It is called, when mouse is moved.

Only objects with focus receive this event.

Parameters
position- position of mouse pointer on client area (picture coords).
Returns
true if this shape should hold focus to catch longer all mouse movements.

Implemented in iview::CViewBase, iview::CParallelogramShape, iview::CViewport, iview::CTransformableRectangleShape, iview::CPolygonShape, iview::CTubePolylineShape, iview::CLabelShape, iview::CInteractiveShapeBase, iview::CArrowShape, iview::CLineShape, iview::CRectangleShape, iview::CAnnulusShape, iview::CPinShape, iview::CCenterPinShape, iview::CPerspectiveCalibrationBoundsShape, iview::CCircleShape, and iview::CAnnulusSegmentShape.
